channel.title: Comments on: Problems with DWA 7 and Firefox 1.5?

item.title: By: Christian Brandlehner
item.dc:creator: Christian Brandlehner
item.description: <p>This problem has been fixed in Firefox and is not reproduceable with Firefox 1.5.0.4. <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$FILE/smile.gif"</a>> </p>
item.content:encoded: This problem has been fixed in Firefox and is not reproduceable with Firefox 1.5.0.4. http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$FILE/smile.gif“>

item.title: By: Chris Whisonant
item.dc:creator: Chris Whisonant
item.description: <p>Ditto here... When I try to compose a message, the rich text box does not load. So, there may be an issue with that portion of the code.</p>
item.content:encoded: Ditto here… When I try to compose a message, the rich text box does not load. So, there may be an issue with that portion of the code.
